text: 4. The implementation of social value interventions is secured and compliance is monitored as part of a planning obligation. 62 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Supporting text 11.57 Part 1 of the policy sets out the councilâ€™s intention to maximise the delivery of social value through development, ensuring positive contribution to community benefits including economic well-being, social inclusion, equal opportunity, and community cohesion.
